thread.title: Facebook Updates Messenger for Windows Phone with Small Improvements, Bug Fixes
thread.title_full: Facebook Updates Messenger for Windows Phone with Small Improvements, Bug Fixes - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Facebook Updates Messenger for Windows Phone with Small Improvements, Bug Fixes
text: Facebook continues to keep its Windows Phone applications up to date, even though these updates don't come so often as users would want. The latest Facebook-branded application to receive an update is Messenger. The new version of the application hasn't been officially announced by developers, but the listing on Windows Store mentions a new version is now available for download. The good news is the new version of Messenger for Windows Phone comes with an official change... Â»
